title: One Piece Little Garden Arc (70-77) Review
author: DLStudios
description: A comprehensive review of the Little Garden arc, describing it as 'some of the best writing in the series so far' with great character moments and jokes.

title: One Piece: Little Garden Arc | Summary, Recap & Review
author: Poggers Editorial Team
description: Notes the arc is 'highly regarded among fans' and 'combines a captivating plot, engaging action, humorous moments, and intriguing character dynamics.'

title: The Great One Piece Journey (Part 8): Little Garden
author: Jonah
description: Calls Little Garden 'a rock solid arc' that 'encapsulates a lot of what I love about early One Piece.' Part of a comprehensive One Piece journey blog series.

title: One Piece Volume 14: Little Garden Beyond the Battle, Between Symbolism and Esoterism
author: Antiel.ARt
description: Deep analysis exploring symbolism and esoteric themes in Little Garden arc. Explores 'epic battle that has lasted a century and the intriguing presence of the Baroque Works agents' with hidden layers of meaning.

title: One Piece Little Garden Arc (70-77) Review
author: DLStudios
description: Highlights that 'One Piece seems to shine' with 'simple motives and plots executed well with characters you get invested in.' Comprehensive review of the Little Garden arc.
